description: A beautiful 3-bedroom house in Nuwara Eliya.
longDescription: Experience the charm of a beautiful 3-bedroom house nestled in the scenic landscapes of Nuwara Eliya, offering modern comfort and breathtaking views. Located in the serene 22200 postal area, this property is perfect for families or investors seeking a peaceful retreat. With a selling price of just Rs3,500,000, this home promises unmatched value. this delightful house!

Discover a cozy 2-bedroom flat in the vibrant city of Colombo, perfectly located in the 00100 postal area. Ideal for urban living, this rental property offers modern amenities and convenience at an affordable price of Rs175,000.
Explore a spacious 4-bedroom house in the historic city of Galle, located in the 80000 postal area. Perfect for family living, this property is available for sale at Rs45,000,000.
Discover a modern 1-bedroom flat in the vibrant city of Kurunegala, located in the 60000 postal area. Ideal for comfortable urban living, this property is available for rent at Rs180,000.
Explore a charming 2-bedroom house in the serene town of Yakkala, situated in the 11870 postal area. Perfect for those seeking a peaceful retreat, this property is available for sale at Rs3,000,000.
Discover an elegant 1-bedroom flat in the coastal city of Kalutara, located in the 12000 postal area. Ideal for comfortable living, this rental property is available for just Rs149,000
Experience luxury living in this stunning 5-bedroom house in the heart of Kandy, located in the 20000 postal area. On the market for Rs17,000,000, this home offers space, style, and sophistication.

Enjoy spacious urban living in this well-designed 3-bedroom flat located in the coastal town of Matara, with the 81000 postal area. Perfect for families or professionals, this property is available for rent at just Rs220,000. Modern amenities and proximity to essential facilities make it a top choice.

Discover the perfect blend of tradition and modernity in this exquisite 3-bedroom house located in the historic city of Anuradhapura. Situated in the peaceful 50000 postal area, this property offers contemporary living at a price of Rs9,500,000. With spacious interiors and a beautiful yard, it's an ideal family home.
